name: Killing Eve
description:
Your a cop investigating a murder case that took place at 10pm on Christmas Eve... Who would do such a thing?

This is the jam edition of the game (that means it was rushed) and i will make a better and complete version (if people want more)

THIS PROJECT WAS MADE IN 48 HOURS (2 DAYS, i'M ALSO A SOLO DEV)

This game was created for Twitch Game Jam:

https://itch.io/jam/twitch-christmas-jam

Controls:

Use arrow keys to navigate the menu and [SPACE] to select on menu

[E] to interact

WASD to move around
